Actions.Name: Add a notification
Actions.Description: Add notification receivers to a tracking number.

Actions.Name: Detect courier
Actions.Description: Return a list of matched couriers based on tracking number format and selected couriers or a list of couriers.

Actions.Name: Get all couriers
Actions.Description: Return a list of all couriers.

Actions.Name: Get a tracking
Actions.Description: Get tracking results of a single tracking.

Actions.Name: Get last checkpoint
Actions.Description: Return the tracking information of the last checkpoint of a single tracking.

Actions.Name: Get tracking notification
Actions.Description: Get contact information for the users to notify when the tracking changes. Please note that only customer receivers will be returned. Any email, sms or webhook that belongs to the Store will not be returned.

Actions.Name: Get trackings
Actions.Description: Get tracking results of multiple trackings.

Actions.Name: Get user activated couriers
Actions.Description: Return a list of couriers activated at your AfterShip account.

Actions.Name: Mark tracking as completed
Actions.Description: Mark a tracking as completed. The tracking won't auto update until retrack it.

Actions.Name: Remove a notification
Actions.Description: Remove notification receivers from a tracking number.

Actions.Name: Retrack an expired tracking
Actions.Description: Retrack an expired tracking. Max 3 times per tracking.
